description: List of available reports displayed by `tqc report --list`

json_value.name: mlwh-data
json_value.description: Report of data from ToLQC the same format as `fetch-mlwh-data` fetches it from the MLWH

json_value.name: ont-data
json_value.description: Oxford Nanopore Technology (ONT) sequencing data in ToLQC

json_value.name: pipeline-data
json_value.description: Report of all the sequencing data in ToLQC with useful fields and locations for feeding into other scripts

json_value.name: specimen-status
json_value.description: Status of specimens, listing species information, projects and sequencing data attached to the species

json_value.name: folder/<TABLE_NAME>
json_value.description: Show the contents of any table which has folders attached, together with each row's expanded paths to S3 images and data files in its attached folders
